title: Why do we apparently lose mmr for a remake ?
body: If your team is the team that called the remake that is.

replies.body: You don't. If you are looking at a site like op.gg or lolking, they are wrong

What makes you think you are losing MMR? 

For those who weren't the leaver, the remade game practically didn't exist. [No MMR changes, no LP changes, only 3 minutes of your time wasted, and a neutral grey blip in your match history. ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/play-games-matter/remake)
How do you know you lost MMR?
only if you disconnect and cause the remake to happen, you lose only LP not mmr.
